#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
int t,i,count;
string str,str1;
	cin>>t;
	while(t>0)
	{
	count=0;
	cin>>str>>str1;
	if(str.length()!=str1.length())
	{cout<<"-1"<<endl;t--;continue;}
	else{
	if(str.compare(str1)==0)
	{cout<<"0"<<endl;t--;continue;}
	for(i=0;i<str.length();i++)
	{
	if(str[i]!=str1[i])
	count++;
	
	}
	
	}
	
	cout<<count<<endl;
	t--;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
